content: Other times, he’ll begin to pick up a massive boulder, but instead of tossing it, he’ll leap across the room to personally deliver the massive rock to your face, which can deal a ton of damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Battle - Mad Tiger'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, he’ll begin to pick up a massive boulder, but instead of tossing it, he’ll leap across the room to personally deliver the massive rock to your face, which can deal a ton of damage.
